verses.verse: וּפְלִשְׁתִּים֙ <S%H6430><s%> u-fe-lish-Tim And the Philistines לָֽקְח֔וּ <S%H3947><s%> la-ke-Chu, took אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> a-Ron the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him; of God וַיְבִאֻ֛הוּ <S%H935><s%> vay-vi-'U-hu and brought מֵאֶ֥בֶן me-'E-ven הָעֵ֖זֶר <S%H72><s%> ha-'E-zer it from Ebenezer אַשְׁדּֽוֹדָה׃ <S%H795><s%> ash-Do-dah. unto Ashdod

וַיִּקְח֤וּ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Chu took פְלִשְׁתִּים֙ <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim When the Philistines אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> a-Ron the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God וַיָּבִ֥יאוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vi-'u they brought אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit it into the house דָּג֑וֹן <S%H1712><s%> da-Gon; of Dagon וַיַּצִּ֥יגוּ <S%H3322><s%> vai-yatz-Tzi-gu and set אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To אֵ֥צֶל <S%H681><s%> 'E-tzel it by דָּגֽוֹן׃ <S%H1712><s%> da-Gon. Dagon

וַיַּשְׁכִּ֤מוּ <S%H7925><s%> vai-yash-Ki-mu arose early אַשְׁדּוֹדִים֙ <S%H796><s%> ash-do-Dim And when they of Ashdod מִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <S%H4283><s%> mi-mo-cho-Rat, on the morrow וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh behold דָג֗וֹן <S%H1712><s%> da-Gon, behold Dagon נֹפֵ֤ל <S%H5307><s%> no-Fel [was] fallen לְפָנָיו֙ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav upon his face אַ֔רְצָה <S%H776><s%> 'Ar-tzah, to the earth לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> a-Ron the ark יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Chu And they took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דָּג֔וֹן <S%H1712><s%> da-Gon, Dagon וַיָּשִׁ֥בוּ <S%H7725><s%> vai-ya-Shi-vu again אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To לִמְקוֹמֽוֹ׃ <S%H4725><s%> lim-ko-Mo. him in his place

וַיַּשְׁכִּ֣מוּ <S%H7925><s%> vai-yash-Ki-mu And when they arose early בַבֹּקֶר֮ <S%H1242><s%> vab-bo-Ker morning מִֽמָּחֳרָת֒ <S%H4283><s%> mi-mo-cho-Rat on the morrow וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh behold דָג֗וֹן <S%H1712><s%> da-Gon, behold Dagon נֹפֵ֤ל <S%H5307><s%> no-Fel [was] fallen לְפָנָיו֙ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav upon his face אַ֔רְצָה <S%H776><s%> 'Ar-tzah, to the ground לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> a-Ron the ark יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD וְרֹ֨אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> ve-Rosh and the head דָּג֜וֹן <S%H1712><s%> da-Gon of Dagon וּשְׁתֵּ֣י׀ <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Tei and both כַּפּ֣וֹת <S%H3709><s%> kap-Pot the palms יָדָ֗יו <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dav, of his hands כְּרֻתוֹת֙ <S%H3772><s%> ke-ru-tOt [were] cut off אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- on הַמִּפְתָּ֔ן <S%H4670><s%> ham-mif-Tan, upon the threshold רַ֥ק <S%H7535><s%> rak but דָּג֖וֹן <S%H1712><s%> da-Gon only [the stump of] Dagon נִשְׁאַ֥ר <S%H7604><s%> nish-'Ar was left עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav. and

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כֵּ֡ן <S%H3651><s%> ken after that לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- neither יִדְרְכוּ֩ <S%H1869><s%> yid-re-Chu tread כֹהֲנֵ֨י <S%H3548><s%> cho-ha-Nei Therefore neither the priests דָג֜וֹן <S%H1712><s%> da-Gon of Dagon וְכָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all הַבָּאִ֧ים <S%H935><s%> hab-ba-'Im nor any that come בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- house דָּג֛וֹן <S%H1712><s%> da-Gon into Dagon's עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on מִפְתַּ֥ן <S%H4670><s%> mif-Tan on the threshold דָּג֖וֹן <S%H1712><s%> da-Gon of Dagon בְּאַשְׁדּ֑וֹד <S%H795><s%> be-'ash-Dod; in Ashdod עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. to this ס sa-Mek

וַתִּכְבַּ֧ד <S%H3513><s%> vat-tich-Bad was heavy יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> yad- But the hand יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- on הָאַשְׁדּוֹדִ֖ים <S%H796><s%> ha-'ash-do-Dim upon them of Ashdod וַיְשִׁמֵּ֑ם <S%H8074><s%> vay-shim-Mem; and he destroyed וַיַּ֤ךְ <S%H5221><s%> vai-Yach them and smote אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam ; בָּעֳפָלִים bo-'o-fa-lim כבַּטְּחֹרִ֔ים <S%H6076><s%> bat-te-cho-Rim, stronghold קאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַשְׁדּ֖וֹד <S%H795><s%> ash-Dod [even] Ashdod וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et גְּבוּלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H1366><s%> ge-vu-Lei-ha. and the coasts

וַיִּרְא֥וּ <S%H7200><s%> vai-yir-'U saw אַנְשֵֽׁי־ <S%H582><s%> 'an-shei- And when the men אַשְׁדּ֖וֹד <S%H795><s%> ash-Dod of Ashdod כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that it was כֵ֑ן <S%H3651><s%> Chen; so וְאָמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-me-Ru, that [it was] so they said לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- must not יֵשֵׁ֞ב <S%H3427><s%> ye-Shev shall not abide אֲר֨וֹן <S%H727><s%> a-Ron The ark אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei of the God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel עִמָּ֔נוּ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Ma-nu, with כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for קָשְׁתָ֤ה <S%H7185><s%> ka-she-Tah is sore יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do with us for his hand עָלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu, and וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al on דָּג֥וֹן <S%H1712><s%> da-Gon upon us and upon Dagon אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu. our god

וַיִּשְׁלְח֡וּ <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-le-Chu They sent וַיַּאַסְפוּ֩ <S%H622><s%> vai-ya-'as-Fu therefore and gathered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all סַרְנֵ֨י <S%H5633><s%> sar-Nei all the lords פְלִשְׁתִּ֜ים <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim of the Philistines אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, to וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru unto them and said מַֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What נַּעֲשֶׂ֗ה <S%H6213><s%> na-'a-Seh, What shall we do לַֽאֲרוֹן֙ <S%H727><s%> la-'a-rOn with the ark אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-Ru, and said גַּ֣ת <S%H1661><s%> gat unto Gath יִסֹּ֔ב <S%H5437><s%> yis-So, be carried about אֲר֖וֹן <S%H727><s%> a-Ron Let the ark אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וַיַּסֵּ֕בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> vai-yas-Seb-bu about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲר֖וֹן <S%H727><s%> a-Ron the ark אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei of the God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel ס sa-Mek

וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become אַחֲרֵ֣י׀ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei And it was [so] that after הֵסַ֣בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> he-Sab-bu they had carried it about אֹת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, וַתְּהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> vat-te-Hi become יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> yad- the hand יְהוָ֤ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD בָּעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> ba-'Ir was against the city מְהוּמָה֙ <S%H4103><s%> me-hu-Mah destruction גְּדוֹלָ֣ה <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lah great מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od, with a very וַיַּךְ֙ <S%H5221><s%> vai-yaCh and he smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> 'an-Shei the men הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir, of the city מִקָּטֹ֖ן <S%H6996><s%> mik-ka-Ton both small וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- against גָּד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol; and great וַיִּשָּׂתְר֥וּ <S%H8368><s%> vai-yis-sa-te-Ru in their secret parts לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem ; עֳפָלִים 'o-fa-lim כטְחֹרִֽים׃ <S%H6076><s%> te-cho-Rim. stronghold ק

וַֽיְשַׁלְּח֛וּ <S%H7971><s%> vay-shal-le-Chu Therefore they sent אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> a-Ron the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him of God עֶקְר֑וֹן <S%H6138><s%> ek-Ron; to Ekron וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, become כְּב֨וֹא <S%H935><s%> ke-Vo came אֲר֤וֹן <S%H727><s%> a-Ron And it came to pass as the ark הָאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him of God עֶקְר֔וֹן <S%H6138><s%> ek-Ron, to Ekron וַיִּזְעֲק֨וּ <S%H2199><s%> vai-yiz-'a-Ku cried out הָֽעֶקְרֹנִ֜ים <S%H6139><s%> ha-'ek-ro-Nim that the Ekronites לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying הֵסַ֤בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> he-Sab-bu They have brought about אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲרוֹן֙ <S%H727><s%> 'a-rOn the ark אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel לַהֲמִיתֵ֖נִי <S%H4191><s%> la-ha-mi-Te-ni to us to slay וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et עַמִּֽי׃ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi. us and our people

וַיִּשְׁלְח֨וּ <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-le-Chu So they sent וַיַּאַסְפ֜וּ <S%H622><s%> vai-ya-'as-Fu and gathered together אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all סַרְנֵ֣י <S%H5633><s%> sar-Nei all the lords פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim, of the Philistines וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru and said שַׁלְּח֞וּ <S%H7971><s%> shal-le-Chu Send away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲר֨וֹן <S%H727><s%> a-Ron the ark אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei of the God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וְיָשֹׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> ve-ya-Sho and let it go again לִמְקֹמ֔וֹ <S%H4725><s%> lim-ko-Mo, to his own place וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- so יָמִ֥ית <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mit that it slay אֹתִ֖י <S%H853><s%> 'o-Ti וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et עַמִּ֑י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi; us not and our people כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for הָיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-ye-Tah become מְהֽוּמַת־ <S%H4103><s%> me-hu-mat- destruction מָ֙וֶת֙ <S%H4194><s%> ma-vet for there was a deadly בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol throughout הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir, throughout all the city כָּבְדָ֥ה <S%H3513><s%> ka-ve-Dah heavy מְאֹ֛ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od was very יַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> yad the hand הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him of God שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham. there

וְהָֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <S%H376><s%> ve-ha-'a-na-Shim and the men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not מֵ֔תוּ <S%H4191><s%> Me-tu, that died הֻכּ֖וּ <S%H5221><s%> huk-Ku not were smitten; בָּעֳפָלִים bo-'o-fa-lim כבַּטְּחֹרִ֑ים <S%H6076><s%> bat-te-cho-Rim; stronghold קוַתַּ֛עַל <S%H5927><s%> vat-Ta-'al went up שַֽׁוְעַ֥ת <S%H7775><s%> shav-'At and the cry הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir of the city הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim. to heaven
